messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Donald in Mathmagicland in New York and Massachusetts
messages.msgSnippet: It is a free 3-day loan only - and only to teachers with a school address. Darn. -pam
messages.messageBody:
It is a free 3-day loan only - and only to teachers with a "school
address."
Darn.

-pam

> Niagara Mohawk, Massachusetts Electric, Narragansett Electric,
Granite State
> Electric, and Nantucket Electric.
>
> If those sound like your electric company, you might be able to
get a free
> VSH tape of a long-out-of-print late-'50s Disney cartoon called
Donald in
> Mathemagicland. I saw it (a short version, probably) in a theatre
when I was a kid.
> We've rented it from Hollywood Video, but it's not available for
sale or
> I'd've bought one. But while I was looking, I found this.
>
> It has a VERY fun section on pool tables and angles and fancy pool
shots.


Wow, I loved this as a kid and I know my own little math-hound would
love it too, but we're on the west coast. If anyone lives in one of
these areas and isn't interested in getting this tape for themselves
and wouldn't mind ordering one, I'd be more than willing to pay for
shipping, etc. I'd love to see it again, but the price from Disney
is $50!

Blue Skies,
-Robin-

messages.subject: Donald in Mathmagicland in New York and Massachusetts
messages.msgSnippet: Niagara Mohawk, Massachusetts Electric, Narragansett Electric, Granite State Electric, and Nantucket Electric. If those sound like your electric company, you
messages.messageBody:
Niagara Mohawk, Massachusetts Electric, Narragansett Electric, Granite State
Electric, and Nantucket Electric.

If those sound like your electric company, you might be able to get a free
VSH tape of a long-out-of-print late-'50s Disney cartoon called Donald in
Mathemagicland. I saw it (a short version, probably) in a theatre when I was a kid.
We've rented it from Hollywood Video, but it's not available for sale or
I'd've bought one. But while I was looking, I found this.

It has a VERY fun section on pool tables and angles and fancy pool shots.



http://www.culverco.com/edservices/catalog_ny/pages_detail/v130_detail.html


Only schools and customers in the following communities are eligible for
these free resources.

Teachers can order classroom quantities. Parents can order single copies of
the various literature titles. These materials are available ONLY to those
customers served by Niagara Mohawk, Massachusetts Electric, Narragansett Electric,
Granite State Electric, and Nantucket Electric.
